Given Que se tiene unas ogligaciones  adecuadas  "Obligation1"
And Se  ejecuta los cargos financieros para las obligaciones

testSteps.description:
When El usuario crea un recaudo manual uno a uno con los siguientes datos
| value | receptionTime | receptionDate | clientReferent | clientBeneficiary | payment | collectionChannel |
| 565404132 | 12:00 A.M | 12192022 | 8506902438 | 8506902438 | Efectivo | Sucursal virtual empresas |

children.description: Administrator clicks on option income register
Administrator clicks on select referent client
Administrator clicks on Select client beneficiary
Administrator clicks on Select client beneficiary
Administrator enters '565404132' into Option Value Collection
Administrator clicks on Select Justificacion Registration
Administrator clicks on Option Justificaction Registration
Administrator clicks on Select Option Channel
Administrator clicks on Select Registration Confirm

testSteps.description: Then Deberia de visualizar  las 5 obligaciones en estado cancelado en la base de datos de SAF

children.description: Then validate the records of ogligations the in data base$$ lambda$453/608392736 should be (true)
